name: Extra Parts
description:
This game was made for a 42 hour game jam at the University of Michigan. The theme was "Too much of a good thing" so we made a space shooter where powerups grow the size of your ship. The more you collect the stronger you get at the cost of your hitbox getting bigger. 

I worked on enemies and their attack patterns, the scrolling background and level design.

Thanks Kenney for must of the assets.
